Name: Funny Truck
About the game: Throw annoying people out of your truck. Collect points. -Bright, juicy graphics. -Funny game, funny sounds. -Ragdoll system on humans. -There is no goal in the game, just enjoy it as you want. -Young children should like it. -Lots of jumps for ascent and descent. Funny Truck should definitely cheer you up, enjoy.
